content: On Medium, I wholeheartedly I agree — you put it much more colorfully than I could have previously imagined, but yeah. Agree perfectly. I would love to have a good blog and love to be able to use tools to be able to communicate more effectively. I just don’t know where [which platform? Wordpress? Other? homegrown?] or how [if I do Wordpress, it’s a learning curve, is it worth it? Does it have what is needed?]?? One thing I do like a lot about Medium is the linked content and the daily in mail of topics I’d be interested in and who I follow. I don’t know if other blogs do or don’t have these features — they seemed to, to a degree, but not quite as evolved as Medium. Please feel free to re-direct if I’m mistaken.
